s3games.io

Class Config

  • java.lang.Object
    • s3games.io.Config
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class Config
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Configuration of all kinds that is serialized to a config file is stored here. (not in much use currently)
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
